News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Maidstone United
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Maidstone United
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Maidstone United
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League home match against Maidstone United tomorrow
News.description:
The Daggers will be looking for back to back Tuesday night home wins following their 2-1 win over Bromley last week.

Maidstone United currently occupy 21st place in the Vanarama National League on goal difference following their 0-0 draw away to Braintree on Saturday.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 2-1 Bromley
Daggers 1-2 Guiseley
Southport 1-4 Daggers
Daggers 3-2 Chester
Tranmere 0-2 Daggers
 
Maidstone United
Braintree 0-0 Maidstone
Maidstone 4-2 Chester
York 1-1 Maidstone
Maidstone 0-2 Aldershot
Solihull 2-0 Maidstone

Team News
Corey Whitely is still suspended following his red card against Guiseley AFC. Matt Robinson, Luke Howell, Luke Pennell and Curtley Williams are still not available for the Daggers.
 
Previous Meetings
The Daggers last met Maidstone United in November where a Luke Guttridge goal won the game for the Daggers in Kent.

Fixtures
There is nine fixtures in the Vanarama National League on Tuesday. All 7:45pm KO.
Bromley V Braintree
Daggers v Maidstone
Eastleigh V Aldershot
Guiseley V Barrow
Lincoln v York
Solihull V Torquay
Sutton V Boreham Wood
Tranmere V Forest Green
Woking V Dover

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
